name: Air Robots War 3D
description:
The enemies are strong and powerful and you need to eliminate the unfriendly forces. Aim your enemy's bots and destroy them by hitting fire button. A deadly futuristic robot war has just begun. Throw bombs and keep shooting as fast as you can. Wipe out the future unfriendly robots and turn them into dust!
Can you be that Super Air Mechbot that has the power to WIN the Ultimate battle for domination?

Features
3D environment
Amazing beautiful robots
Great control
Different shooting options
Fights every where
